description: Non-Material Amendment to planning permission reference: P2019/2991/S73, dated: 30/03/2020 "Erection of 11 storey over basement building comprising 4 Class A1 retail units at ground floor level and Class B1 (office) above, plus ancillary facilities" to include the provision for basement level servicing. The latest amendment includes omission of fritting on the glazing panels and the inclusion of high level spandrel panels on the north elevation.
decision_conditions:
